spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall massing resembles the 2D plan (bedroom top-left, living/dining center-left, kitchen/utility to the right, toilet near top-center/right, balcony bottom-left), but key spatial/entry sequencing is wrong. The foyer shown in plan at the bottom-right is not clearly modeled as a distinct space; the main entry appears to open more directly into the living area. Several door locations/orientations do not match the plan, and some exterior window placements (notably kitchen/utility side) are missing or unclear. Room proportions appear altered (living vs bedroom and right-side service zone widths).

structural_fidelity.notes: Walls are generally coherent and consistent in thickness, and major adjacencies (living-to-kitchen, kitchen-to-utility, bedroom-to-living, toilet near corridor) mostly match. However, the foyer as a defined enclosed/partitioned entry zone is effectively absent/merged, and at least one interior doorway/threshold is replaced with an open passage. No extra (hallucinated) rooms are introduced.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture types broadly match expected usage (bed in bedroom, sofa in living, dining table in living/dining, kitchen counters, toilet fixtures). Placement is approximate but not faithful to the plan’s indicated layout (e.g., living seating/dining positions and circulation clearances differ). Furniture scale is generally consistent.

aesthetic_quality.notes: Clean, readable isometric-like view with simple lighting and mostly distortion-free geometry. Projection is not strictly architectural orthographic/isometric (perspective is present). Materials are minimal but clarity is acceptable; no major rendering artifacts observed.

detected_errors.description: Foyer (bottom-right, 4'6"x3'10") is not clearly present as a distinct room/zone; entry sequence appears merged into living area.
Main entry door is misplaced relative to the 2D plan (plan: bottom-right into foyer; render: entry appears closer to bottom-center and into main space).
Kitchen separation/doorway condition from foyer/living is incorrect (plan shows a defined kitchen entry; render uses a more open passage with missing/altered door).
Exterior windows on the right-side service wall (kitchen/utility) are missing or not represented as in the 2D plan.
Room proportions appear distorted: living/dining vs bedroom sizing and/or the right-side (kitchen/utility/toilet) widths do not preserve the 2D plan’s relative dimensions.
